title: Anyone know what this font is?
tags: help me with a type id
content:
Hi I'd be really grateful if anyone could tell me what this font is?

[http://megabooth.com/wp-content/uploads/logos/7.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015113031/http:/megabooth.com/wp-content/uploads/logos/7.png "http://megabooth.com/wp-content/uploads/logos/7.png")

Thank-you!
author: 123aneliese

comments.content:
Link does not work for me.  
Don

Thanks defiantone. Pretty small to say with any certainty what it is. Also don't know what if anything was edited for the logo. [Hurme Geometric Sans 4 Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015113031/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hurme-design/hurme-geometric-sans-4/) is somewhat of a match for all letters, except h where the tail may have been clipped.  
Don
